articles.content: Willis Reed, the legendary captain and star center for the New York Knicks who led the franchise to its only two championships and was the author of one of the signature moments in NBA history, has d… [+5119 chars]

articles.author: Chris Mannix
articles.title: The Debate Over This Year’s NBA MVP Race Keeps Getting More Heated - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: You’d have an easier time getting people to agree on the Oscars than who should win this year’s league MVP honors.
articles.content:
If you think Nikola Jokić is the league MVP, you hate Joel Embiid. 
If you’re Team Embiid, you’re dismissive of Jokić.
If you would cast your hypothetical ballot for Giannis Antetokounmpo, you thin… [+5250 chars]
